title: Bringing 1.7 back!

replies.body:
Personally, I would love to see 1.7 come back, at least in tournament servers, since 1.7 is the best version by far IMO. Although, it won't happen. Avicus has updated almost everything to be able to be compatible with 1.8 only, so reversing it would be a pain for the developers, so I doubt they'd do it.
Don't get me wrong tho, I'm glad we're still in 1.8 at least and not 1.9.
replies.body_tagged:
Personally, I would love to see 1.7 come back, at least in tournament servers, since 1.7 is the best version by far IMO. Although, it won't happen. Avicus has updated almost everything to be able to be compatible with 1.8 only, so reversing it would be a pain for the developers, so I doubt they'd do it.
Don't get me wrong tho, I'm glad we're still in 1.8 at least and not 1.9.

Actually no.

Funky counted the number of 1.8 clients and 1.7 clients joining and I believe around 91% or something that high of clients were in 1.8 when it was 1.8 compatible.

Best to keep it full 1.8.
